text: Princess Christina, Mrs. Magnuson, (Christina Louise Helena, born 3 August 1943) is the youngest of the four older sisters of King Carl XVI Gustaf of Sweden. She usually uses the name Christina Magnuson. ==Titles, styles and honours== ===Titles and styles=== * 3 August 1943 – 1 February 1974: Her Royal Highness Princess Christina of Sweden * 1 February 1974 – present: Princess Christina, Mrs. Magnuson === Honours === * : Member Grand Cross of the Royal Order of the Seraphim (LoK av KMO) * : Grand Cross of the Order of the Liberator General San Martín * : Knight of the Order of the Elephant * : Commander of the Order of the Legion of Honour * : Grand Cross of the Order of Merit of the Federal Republic of Germany, 1st Class * : Grand Cross of the Order of the Falcon * : Grand Cross of the Order of Merit of the Italian Republic * : Paulownia Dame Grand Cordon of the Order of the Precious Crown * : Grand Cross of the Order of the Crown (11 October 2022) * : Knight Grand Cross of the Order of Saint Olav * : Grand Cross of the Order of Christ * : Order of the Yugoslav Great Star ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Christina 1943 Christina, Princess Category:Disinherited European royalty Category:Royal Order of the Seraphim
title: Princess Christina, Mrs. Magnuson
